tags.name: umb-checkbox
tags.description:
### Umbraco checkbox 

 Usage: 

 ```html 
 <umb-checkbox 
    model='{boolean}' 
    value='{string}' 
    name='{string}' 
    text='{string}' 
    [input-id='{string}'] 
    [label-key='{string}'] 
    [server-validation-field='{string}'] 
    [disabled='{boolean}'] 
    [required='{boolean}'] 
    [on-change='{callback}'] 
    [css-class='{string}'] 
    [icon='{string}'] 
    [disable-dirty-check='{boolean}']>
</umb-checkbox> 
 ```

attributes.name: model
attributes.description:
Set to `true` or `false` to set the checkbox to checked or unchecked. 

 Type: `boolean`

attributes.name: value
attributes.description:
Set the value of the checkbox. 

 Type: `string`

attributes.name: name
attributes.description:
Set the name of the checkbox. 

 Type: `string`

attributes.name: text
attributes.description:
Set the text for the checkbox label. 

 Type: `string`

attributes.name: input-id
attributes.description:
Set the `id` of the checkbox. 

 Type: `string`

attributes.name: label-key
attributes.description:
Set a dictinary/localization string for the checkbox label. 

 Type: `string`

attributes.name: server-validation-id
attributes.description:
Set the `val-server-field` of the checkbox. 

 Type: `string`

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description:
Set the checkbox to be disabled. 

 Type: `boolean`

attributes.name: required
attributes.description:
Set the checkbox to be required. 

 Type: `boolean`

attributes.name: on-change
attributes.description:
Callback when the value of the checkbox is changed by interaction. 

 Type: `callback function`

attributes.name: css-class
attributes.description:
Set a css class modifier. 

 Type: `string`

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description:
Set an icon next to checkbox. 

 Type: `string`

attributes.name: disable-dirty-check
attributes.description:
Disable checking if the model is dirty. 

 Type: `boolean`

references.name: Umbraco API Docs V8 > Umbraco checkbox directive `umbCheckbox`
